segments.text: That sink overflow is creating such a disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing over the edge onto everything—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle without a care is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids rummaging in the cookie jar like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks filthy from all the kitchen grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dish towel is probably soaked from splashes soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, making the floor a slippery, nasty hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, unlike this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies behind her back feels sneaky and wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the carelessness leading to this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned into a soggy nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR
